name: JSONDecoder.DataDecodingStrategy
desc: The strategies for decoding raw data.

items.name: case base64
items.desc: The strategy that decodes data using Base 64 decoding.

items.name: case custom((Decoder) -> Data)
items.desc: The strategy that decodes data using a user-defined function.

items.name: case deferredToData
items.desc: The strategy that encodes data using the encoding specified by the data instance itself.
